item.title: Cypher Query
item.description: write your own cypher queries examples: first 10 relationships , db schema , return 150 Query #textarea_repl_408 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 80px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_408() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_408').val() neo.run_query(cypher) } function afterLoad() { if ('yes'==='yes') run_Query_repl_408() } function get_Query_from_Url() { $.

item.title: Cypher Table

item.title: 4-graphs
item.description:
Here are multiple queries of cypher MATCH (a)-[to]-(b) with different values of Limit showing 5 0 nodes 0 edges neo = null $("#limit_5").height(200); $("#limit_5").width( ); $(function() { options = { cypher : "
 MATCH (a)-[to]-(b)
 return * Limit 5

item.title: Coffee Script REPL
item.description: here is a simple example .card { margin : 0px ; } #card-response { height : 100% ; } #repl { margin : 5px ; } #repl .col-10 { padding-right: 0px ; } #repl .col-2 { padding-left : 5px ; } #card-code .card-header { padding : 0px ; padding-left: 5px; } #card-code .card-actions a { padding : 0px ; } #card-code .card-actions i { color : black ; } #card-code .

item.title: Control Neo4j
item.description: Multiple queries for the api (make sure you are on http;//localhost:3000) Neo4J queries match (n) return n match (n:Movie) return n create node create nodes for issue (GDPR-223) create nodes for issue (RISK-1092) create nodes using regex (GDPR-22) Data setup delete all nodes create all GDPR create all RISK Jira data all ids id:files RISK-1 Fields Schema

item.title: Table - Neo4j Stats
item.description: Query #textarea_repl_729 { border-radius: .8rem; height: 200px; margin-left: 15px; } #cypher-query button { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } .alert { border-radius: .8rem; margin-right: 15px; margin-left: 15px; } MATCH (n) RETURN DISTINCT labels(n) As Labels, count(*) AS NumofNodes, avg(size(keys(n))) AS AvgNumOfPropPerNode, min(size(keys(n))) AS MinNumPropPerNode, max(size(keys(n))) AS MaxNumPropPerNode, avg(size((n)-[]-())) AS AvgNumOfRelationships, min(size((n)-[]-())) AS MinNumOfRelationships, max(size((n)-[]-())) AS MaxNumOfRelationships Run Cypher Cypher Error! function run_Query_repl_729() { cypher = $('#textarea_repl_729').
